properties.name: Borobudur Temple
properties.description: World's largest Buddhist temple, 9th-century step pyramid with 504 Buddha statues

properties.name: Komodo National Park
properties.description: UNESCO site with prehistoric Komodo dragons and world-class diving

properties.name: Mount Bromo
properties.description: Active volcano crater in a sea of volcanic sand, spectacular at sunrise

properties.name: Raja Ampat Islands
properties.description: Most biodiverse marine ecosystem on Earth with pristine coral reefs

properties.name: Prambanan Temple
properties.description: 9th-century Hindu temple complex with towering spires near Yogyakarta

properties.name: Tegallalang Rice Terraces
properties.description: Iconic Balinese stepped rice paddies using traditional subak irrigation

properties.name: Tanah Lot Temple
properties.description: Sea temple perched on offshore rock formation, famous for sunset views

properties.name: Kelimutu Crater Lakes
properties.description: Three volcanic crater lakes displaying different colors on the same peak in Flores

properties.name: Lake Toba
properties.description: World's largest volcanic lake in Sumatra with Samosir Island and Batak culture

properties.name: Uluwatu Temple
properties.description: Dramatic clifftop Hindu temple in Bali with ocean views and Kecak fire dance

properties.name: Nusa Penida (Kelingking Beach)
properties.description: Dramatic island near Bali with T-Rex cliff formation and pristine diving
